word:
Clear-cut Separation.--In the evening I met Brother _____ and told him I had something for him from the Lord. He said, "Why not let me have it now?" 
                                                                           621
I was quite weak, but he lived in _____, ten miles from the school building which was to be my home. So I arose and read to him fifty pages of letter pages, in reference to the office, and also particular ones working in the office. [REFERENCE IS MADE TO A COMMUNICATION FROM WHICH THE PRECEDING ARTICLE IS DRAWN.]
